text: Horsfieldia decalvata is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to the Maluku Islands in Indonesia. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Horsfieldia decalvata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
